19 def float_to_uint(number,v_min,v_max,bits):
20  number = number/(v_max-v_min)*2**bits
21  if (v_min != 0):
22  number = int(number + 2**bits/2)
23  else:
24  number = int(number)
25  return number

29 import rospy
30 from can_msgs.msg import Frame
31 import math
32 import json
33 
34 
35 max_pos = 12.5 # rad
36 min_pos = -12.5 # rad
37 max_pos_bits = 0xFFFF # 16 bits for pos
38 # velocity !!! !!! DIFFERENT FROM AMM
39 max_vel = 45.0 # rad/s
40 min_vel = -45.0 # rad/s
41 max_vel_bits = 0xFFF # 12 bits for vel
42 # torque
43 max_tau = 15.0
44 min_tau = -15.0
45 max_tau_bits = 0xFFF # 12 bits for current
46 Kt = 0.068 # Nm/A
47 # For control params
48 min_kp = 0
49 max_kp = 500
50 max_kp_bits = 0xFFF
51 
52 min_kd = 0
53 max_kd = 5
54 max_kd_bits = 0xFFF
55 
56 def motor_command_callback():
57  # Parse the requested motor command and send it as a CAN frame
58  # Check if the motor is armed
59  p_des = math.radians(30)
60  v_des = 0
61  tau_des = 0
62  kp_val = 200
63  kd_val = 2.5
64  # We just need to do the reverse scaling done when the data was obtained
65  pos_bits = int((p_des- min_pos)* max_pos_bits/( max_pos- min_pos))
66  data0 = pos_bits >> 8
67  data1 = pos_bits & 0xFF
68  # velocity float --> bits
69  vel_bits = int((v_des- min_vel)* max_vel_bits/( max_vel- min_vel))
70  data2 = vel_bits >> 4
71  kp_bits = int((kp_val- min_kp)* max_kp_bits/( max_kp- min_kp))
72  data3 = ((vel_bits & 0xF)<<4)|(kp_bits>>8)
73  data4 = int(kp_bits & 0xFF)
74  kd_bits = int((kd_val- min_kd)* max_kd_bits/( max_kd- min_kd))
75  data5 = kd_bits >> 4
76  tau_bits = int((tau_des- min_tau)* max_tau_bits/( max_tau- min_tau))
77  data6 = ((kd_bits & 0xF)<<4)| (tau_bits >> 8)
78  data7 = tau_bits & 0xFF
79  # cmd.data = [data0, data1, data2, data3, data4, data5, data6, data7]
80  bits = [data0, data1, data2, data3, data4, data5, data6, data7]
81  print(bits)
82  with open("./Sat.json", "w") as fp:
83  json.dump(bits, fp)
84  print("Done writing JSON data into .json file")
85 
86 
87  # Amms calculations
88  p_des = float_to_uint(float(p_des),-12.5,12.5,16)
89  v_des = float_to_uint(float(v_des),-45,45,12)
90  t_des = float_to_uint(float(tau_des),-15,15,12)
91  kp_des = float_to_uint(float(kp_val),0,500,12)
92  kd_des = float_to_uint(float(kd_val),0,5,12)
93  data0 = p_des >>8
94  data1 = p_des & 0xFF
95  data2 = v_des >>4
96  data3 = ((v_des & 0xF)<<4)|(kp_des >>8)
97  data4 = kp_des & 0xFF
98  data5 = kd_des >> 4
99  data6 = ((kd_des & 0xF)<<4)|(t_des >> 8)
100  data7 = t_des & 0xFF
101  bits = [data0, data1, data2, data3, data4, data5, data6, data7]
102  print(bits)
103  with open("./Am.json", "w") as fp:
104  json.dump(bits, fp)
105  print("Done writing JSON data into .json file")
